name: Tank Minesweeper
description:
Clear all the tiles to win! Minesweeper with a twist!

Goal:

Clear all the spaces that don't have a mine. Don't shoot a mine or get destroyed by enemy turrets.

Controls:

Mouse - Aim

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Shoot Missile (Clears the grid and damages turrets)

Right Click - Shoot Flag (Places a flag on grid space)

1,2,3,4 - Change minimap size (1 is no minimap, 4 is largest minimap)

Esc or P - Pause Game

Assets from Gamedev.tv or Unreal Engine C++ Developer: Learn C++ and Make Video Games Udemy course

(Prototype game/demo)

Made with Unreal Engine
